Get To Know Me

About me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself and what I do...

My Story

I am self-taught Web Developer. I studied Computational Linguistics, but realized very quickly, that there is much more in the sphere of programming that I can experience. Therefore I wanted to try out new technologies. The idea of developing applications with one language for all platforms at the same time really gripped me and hasn't let go of me since. The more I learned, the better I understood that that's what I love to do. My goal is to create beautiful apps that are accessible for everyone and reachable from every device.

My Personal Skills

Personal skills are just as important as professional skills!

Communication

I am a very communicative person. I am always open for new ideas and love to share and discuss mine with others.

Teamwork

Trust and reliability are the main virtues for an effective Team. Every person's goal should be to embody them. I always make an effort to do exactly that.

Critical Thinking

Before I start working on a solution for a problem, I try to deconstruct it as much as possible and gather all the necessary information that can help me solve it.

Good Attitude

It doesn't matter where I am or what I do, I always try to create a pleasant atmosphere around me and have a good attitude towards everyone.
